mapper.sql: ID, SHIPMENT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, SHIPMENT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_UNIT, STORAGE_LOCATION_NAME, STORAGE_LOCATION_COD, ALREADY_SHIPMENT_NUMBER, SHIPMENT_DETAILS_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATOR_ID, UPDATER_ID, PRODUCT_SPECIFICATIONS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from OUT_BOUND_SALE_SHIPMENT_DETAILS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

update OUT_BOUND_SALE_SHIPMENT_DETAILS
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SHIPMENT_NO = #{record.shipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{record.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIPMENT_NUMBER = #{record.shipmentNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PRODUCT_UNIT = #{record.productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORAGE_LOCATION_NAME = #{record.storageLocationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ALREADY_SHIPMENT_NUMBER = #{record.alreadyShipmentNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SHIPMENT_DETAILS_STATUS = #{record.shipmentDetailsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
UPDATER_ID = #{record.updaterId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PRODUCT_SPECIFICATIONS = #{record.productSpecifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update OUT_BOUND_SALE_SHIPMENT_DETAILS set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SHIPMENT_NO = #{record.shipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{record.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPMENT_NUMBER = #{record.shipmentNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PRODUCT_UNIT = #{record.productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGE_LOCATION_NAME = #{record.storageLocationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGE_LOCATION_COD = #{record.storageLocationCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALREADY_SHIPMENT_NUMBER = #{record.alreadyShipmentNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SHIPMENT_DETAILS_STATUS = #{record.shipmentDetailsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, UPDATER_ID = #{record.updaterId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PRODUCT_SPECIFICATIONS = #{record.productSpecifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update OUT_BOUND_SALE_SHIPMENT_DETAILS
SHIPMENT_NO = #{shipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIPMENT_NUMBER = #{shipmentNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PRODUCT_UNIT = #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

STORAGE_LOCATION_COD = #{storageLocationCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALREADY_SHIPMENT_NUMBER = #{alreadyShipmentNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SHIPMENT_DETAILS_STATUS = #{shipmentDetailsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
UPDATER_ID = #{updaterId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PRODUCT_SPECIFICATIONS = #{productSpecifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update OUT_BOUND_SALE_SHIPMENT_DETAILS set SHIPMENT_NO = #{shipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPMENT_NUMBER = #{shipmentNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PRODUCT_UNIT = #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGE_LOCATION_NAME = #{storageLocationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGE_LOCATION_COD = #{storageLocationCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALREADY_SHIPMENT_NUMBER = #{alreadyShipmentNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SHIPMENT_DETAILS_STATUS = #{shipmentDetailsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, UPDATER_ID = #{updaterId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PRODUCT_SPECIFICATIONS = #{productSpecifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
update OUT_BOUND_SALE_SHIPMENT_DETAILS set SHIPMENT_DETAILS_STATUS = '已完成' where ID = #{id} and SHIPMENT_NUMBER=ALREADY_SHIPMENT_NUMBER
